title: Guitar Jam Tracks Scales Buddy v2.3
description:
The most popular guitar practice app on iOS is now on ANDROID! 

Join our growing family of 250,000+ users worldwide! 

This award-winning app includes five essential styles for mastering your guitar: Rock, Acoustic Blues, Humbucker Blues, Jazz, Reggae.

MAKES LEARNING GUITAR FUN

Practice jamming, learning the Pentatonic scale and soloing to 5 great sounding jam tracks right from your Android device! 

Our easy-to-read scale charts show you exactly where to put your fingers to start sounding like a pro. See for yourself why thousands of guitarists love our jam track apps!

NINEBUZZ AWARDS AND HIGHLIGHTS

- Guitar World - Top 15 Guitar Apps 
- Gizmodo - Best Apps of the Week 
- IK Multimedia (Makers of Amplitube/iKlip) - App of the Week 
- Premier Guitar - Pocket Power Tools 
- Apple - Featured - What's Hot 
- AppAdvice - "You'll be anxious to practice your chords and scales" 
- iPhoneAppCafe - Top 5 Apps for Guitarists

KEYS INCLUDED:

- A Major / A Minor 
- B Major / B Minor 
- C Major / C Minor 
- D Major / D Minor 
- E Major / E Minor 
- F Major / F Minor 
- G Major / G Minor

STYLES INCLUDED:

- Acoustic Blues 
- Humbucker Blues 
- Jazz 
- Reggae 
- Rock

SCALES INCLUDED:

- Major Pentatonic 
- Minor Pentatonic

HOW IT WORKS:

1. Pick a key to start playing the track. 
2. Tap 'Chords' to see what chords are being played (rhythm) 
3. Tap 'Scales' to see the scale charts for that key (lead)

CHANGE THE STYLE AT ANY TIME!

What's New:

v2.2 --- Fixed in-app purchase related bugs (Restore Purchases button added to Settings page) and added two new in-app purchases! Midnight Blues and Phrygian Modal Jam. Get rocking!

v2.1 --- Fixed purchase bug, and Restore Purchases function. Sorry about that! The in-app purchase processing should be repaired now.

v2.0 --- Introducing Modal Jams! Available for in-app purchase, Mixolydian and Dorian styles. Scale charts included. Update and download now!

More info:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ninebuzz.jamtracks" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ninebuzz.jamtracks</a>
